experience.title: experience
experience.description: I have 3+ years of experience as a front-end developer. Currently i am working as a VueJs developer at Al-Nafi E-learning platform.

hard-skills.title: hard-skills
hard-skills.description: As a front-end developer, I have expertise in developing web applications using Html, Css, Javascript, Vue, react, Nuxt, next, and Tailwindcss

soft-skills.title: soft-skills
soft-skills.description: I have basic knowledge of graphics design tools such as Adobe Photoshop and Adobe Illustrator, and UI UX tools such as Figma and Adobe XD

bio.title: bio
bio.description:
About me
As a Frontend Engineer, I am a skilled and innovative developer specializing in creating dynamic and interactive user interfaces for web applications. With a strong grasp of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, I have a passion for crafting seamless and visually appealing experiences that engage users and drive business goals. My ability to collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams and translate design concepts into functional code has been instrumental in delivering successful projects.

Overall, my dedication to the art of frontend development, problem-solving abilities, and commitment to excellence enable me to contribute significantly to the success of projects, while continuously honing my skills to stay at the forefront of the ever-evolving web landscape.

interests.title: interests
interests.description: I am constantly learning the latest tools and frameworks to stay at the forefront of technology.
